page.title: 12BATCHLEY FARM
page.content:
Total area...................167acres Arable........................55acres Grassland....................103acres Woodland.......................9acres Crops....wheat,barley,oats,hay. Uses for hay....food for sheep&cattle Farm Machinery...2combines,1land-rover 3tractors,1car. Equipment for...hay-making,baling, fertilising,drilling,ploughing, muck-spreading. Animals..109breeding ewes,125fattening lambs,9beef cattle,14calves,13 hens,6ducks,1horse,1bull,10cats,2dogs. Eggs....36 a week. Buildings...2barns,3cattle-sheds,2hen house,1farm-house,1cottage. People.....2live on farm,3work on farm 1employed on farm.
CLASS 3
